00056         CheckBox::CheckBox(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, const Whole Glyph, ConstString &LabelText, UILayer* Layer)
00057             : Widget(name,Layer),
00058               GlyphIndex(Glyph),
00059               Checked(false),
00060               CheckLock(true)
00061         {
00062             Type = Widget::CheckBox;
00063             RelPosition = Position;
00064             RelSize = Size;
00065 
00066             Box = new Button(Name+"CB",Position,Size,Layer);
00067             if(LabelText.empty())
00068             {
00069                 Label = NULL;
00070             }else{
00071                 Vector2 Adjusted = Position;
00072                 Adjusted.X = Position.X + Size.X;
00073                 Label = new MarkupText(Name+"CM",Adjusted,GlyphIndex,LabelText,Layer);
00074             }
00075         }
00076 
00077         CheckBox::~CheckBox()
00078         {
00079             delete Box;
00080             if(Label)
00081                 delete Label;
00082         }
00083 
00084         void CheckBox::SetSpriteSet(std::pair<std::string,std::string>& SpriteSet)
00085         {
00086             Box->SetBackgroundSprite(SpriteSet.first);
00087             if(!SpriteSet.second.empty())
00088                 Box->SetHoveredSprite(SpriteSet.second);
00089         }
00090

00094             if(!UncheckedHovered.empty())

00096         }

00098         void CheckBox::SetCheckedSprites()
00099         {
00100             Box->SetBackgroundSprite(CheckedNorm);
00101             if(!CheckedHovered.empty())
00102                 Box->SetHoveredSprite(CheckedHovered);
00103         }*/

00105         void CheckBox::Update(bool Force)
00106         {
00107             if(HoveredButton || Force)
00108             {
00109                 MetaCode::ButtonState State = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00110                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00111                 {
00112                     CheckLock = false;
00113                 }
00114                 else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING && !CheckLock)
00115                 {
00116                     Checked = !Checked;
00117                     if(Checked)
00118                     {
00119                         SetSpriteSet(CheckedSet);
00120                     }else{
00121                         SetSpriteSet(UncheckedSet);
00122                     }
00123                     CheckLock = true;
00124                 }
00125             }
00126         }
00127 
00128         void CheckBox::SetVisible(bool visible)
00129         {
00130             Box->SetVisible(visible);
00131             if(Label)
00132                 Label->SetVisible(visible);
00133             Visible = visible;
00134         }
00135 
00136         bool CheckBox::IsVisible()
00137         {
00138             return Visible;
00139         }
00140 
00141         void CheckBox::Show()
00142         {
00143             Box->Show();
00144             if(Label)
00145                 Label->Show();
00146             Visible = true;
00147         }
00148 
00149         void CheckBox::Hide()
00150         {
00151             Box->Hide();
00152             if(Label)
00153                 Label->Hide();
00154             Visible = false;
00155         }
00156 
00157         bool CheckBox::IsChecked()
00158         {
00159             return Checked;
00160         }
00161 
00162         void CheckBox::ManualCheck(bool Check)
00163         {
00164             if(Checked==Check)
00165                 return;
00166             Checked = Check;
00167             if(Checked)
00168             {
00169                 SetSpriteSet(CheckedSet);
00170             }else{
00171                 SetSpriteSet(UncheckedSet);
00172             }
00173         }
00174 
00175         bool CheckBox::CheckMouseHover()
00176         {
00177             if(!Visible)
00178                 return false;
00179             if(Box->CheckMouseHover())
00180             {
00181                 HoveredButton = Box;
00182                 //Update();
00183                 return true;
00184             }
00185             HoveredButton = NULL;
00186             return false;
00187         }
00188 
00189         void CheckBox::SetLabelText(String &LabelText)
00190         {
00191             if(!Label)
00192             {
00193                 Vector2 Position = Box->GetPosition();
00194                 Position.X+=Box->GetSize().X;
00195                 Label = new MarkupText(Name+"CM",Position,GlyphIndex,LabelText,Parent);
00196                 Label->SetVisible(Box->IsVisible());
00197             }else{
00198                 Label->SetText(LabelText);
00199             }
00200         }
00201 
00202         String CheckBox::GetLabelText()
00203         {
00204             if(!Label)
00205             {
00206                 String Text = "";
00207                 return Text;
00208             }else{
00209                 return Label->GetText();
00210             }
00211         }
00212 
00213         void CheckBox::SetUncheckedSprite(ConstString& Unchecked, ConstString& Hovered)
00214         {
00215             UncheckedSet.first = Unchecked;
00216             UncheckedSet.second = Hovered;
00217             //UncheckedNorm = Unchecked;
00218             //UncheckedHovered = Hovered;
00219         }
00220 
00221         void CheckBox::SetCheckedSprite(ConstString& Checked, ConstString& Hovered)
00222         {
00223             CheckedSet.first = Checked;
00224             CheckedSet.second = Hovered;
00225             //CheckedNorm = Checked;
00226             //CheckedHovered = Hovered;
00227         }

00229         void CheckBox::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00230         {
00231             RelPosition = Position;
00232             Box->SetPosition(Position);
00233             if(Label)
00234             {
00235                 Vector2 Adjusted = Position;
00236                 Adjusted.X+=Box->GetSize().X;
00237                 Label->SetPosition(Adjusted);
00238             }
00239         }
00240 
00241         Vector2 CheckBox::GetPosition()
00242         {
00243             return RelPosition;
00244         }
00245 
00246         void CheckBox::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00247         {
00248             RelPosition = Position / Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00249             Box->SetActualPosition(Position);
00250             if(Label)
00251             {
00252                 Vector2 Adjusted = Position;
00253                 Adjusted.X+=Box->GetActualSize().X;
00254                 Label->SetActualPosition(Adjusted);
00255             }
00256         }
00257 
00258         Vector2 CheckBox::GetActualPosition()
00259         {
00260             return RelPosition * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00261         }
00262 
00263         void CheckBox::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00264         {
00265             RelSize = Size;
00266             Box->SetSize(Size);
00267             if(Label)
00268             {
00269                 Vector2 Adjusted = Size;
00270                 Adjusted.X+=Box->GetPosition().X;
00271                 Label->SetPosition(Adjusted);
00272             }
00273         }
00274 
00275         Vector2 CheckBox::GetSize()
00276         {
00277             return RelSize;
00278         }
00279 
00280         void CheckBox::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00281         {
00282             RelSize = Size / Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00283             Box->SetActualSize(Size);
00284             if(Label)
00285             {
00286                 Vector2 Adjusted = Size;
00287                 Adjusted.X+=Box->GetActualPosition().X;
00288                 Label->SetActualPosition(Adjusted);
00289             }
00290         }
00291 
00292         Vector2 CheckBox::GetActualSize()
00293         {
00294             return RelSize * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00295         }
00296 
00297         Button* CheckBox::GetCheckBoxButton()
00298         {
00299             return Box;
00300         }
00301 
00302         MarkupText* CheckBox::GetCheckBoxLabel()
00303         {
00304             return Label;
00305         }
